svg.content: <mxfile><diagram name="1. Main.js Logic" id="main-js-logic"></diagram><diagram name="2. Article.js Logic" id="article-js-logic"></diagram><diagram name="3. Search.js Logic" id="search-js-logic"></diagram><diagram name="4. Tag.js Logic" id="tag-js-logic"></diagram><diagram name="5. Topic.js Logic" id="topic-js-logic"></diagram></mxfile>

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 241px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 120px; margin-left: 221px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Lấy topic ID từ URL parameter

switch.text: Lấy topic ID từ URL parameter

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 220px; margin-left: 221px;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 221px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Binary Search:
findTopicIndexById()
(nếu không tìm thấy
→ startIndex = 0)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 460px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
Render Navigation:
- Current topic + 3 random
- Featured topics (right)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 580px; margin-left: 1px;

div.div:
Fisher-Yates Shuffle:
Xáo trộn random topics

Binary Search:
findTopicByIdForNews()
(nếu không tìm thấy
→ currentTopic = topics[0])

- Lọc articles theo topic

Render slider:
- Main article
- Side article
- 3 slider articles
